name: Styling
format:
<style>
    .nr-dashboard-text p {
        font-size: 23px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-text .value {
        font-size: 10px;
    }
   .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: #333333;
        color: #eeeeee;
        height:24px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:nth-child(even) {
        background-color: #3c3c3c;
    }
</style>
